title: Construction of the 3rd stage of the Maternity Ward Complex in Teaching Hospital, Kurunegala
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of  Health, to award the above contract to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB) at a cost of Rs. 914,946,852.90, to be completed within a period of 24 months, was approved by the Cabinet.
